inclusion.criterion: no permeation of surrounding fat planes
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no encasement of major vascular structures
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no distant metastases or peritoneal infiltration
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: colectomy including another part of the colon than right colon
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 62-year-old African-American man with left upper and lower extremity weakness, dark visual spot in right eye, facial numbness, facial drop and slurred speech. Hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism history. Smokes 1 pack per day for 40 years.
